name: Germa Kingdom
text: Activate: Main You may discard 1 card, then rest this stage: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with [GERMA] in its types and add it to your hand. Then, send the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: You may discard 1 card, then rest this stage: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with [GERMA] in its types and add it to your hand. Then, send the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.
